title: The Warrior and The Petulant Princess
description: TANTRUMS AND TUMULT. LESSONS LEARNED. SURRENDER AND SMILES. Princess Lizbett of Verdana, a violet-eyed, copper-haired, spoiled young woman, is absolutely speechless. The mysterious stable boy who stole her heart during her youth has just crossed her path. For years she has dreamed about his long shimmering blonde ringlets and his clear aqua eyes. Larian was no stable boy. He was an apprentice warrior from the Kingdom of Zanderone, famous for its mighty men trained not just in battle, but in the ways of women. Now he's a famous commander and has returned to ask the King for permission to court his beautiful daughter, a Princess who has a reputation for being difficult and reckless. But there is danger lurking, and when Larian tries to foil an evil plot Lizbett's defiant nature puts them both in danger. With the ominous threat still looming, he must find a way to stop her foolishness. If you enjoy adult fairytales in fanciful realms, and hunky heroes who know how to deal with difficult damsels, venture into Verdana. Click the link and watch a masterful warrior tame a petulant Princess while saving a King and his Kingdom.
author: Maggie Carpenter
